title: [Health] Probiotic 'backpacks' show promise for treating inflammatory bowel diseases: Study finds well-equipped gut-friendly bacteria hold for improving treatments of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)

[Cancer] Study has defined five new subgroups of the most common type of blood cancer, chronic lymphocytic leukaemia (CLL) and associated these with clinical outcomes, this new method for risk stratifying patients could lead to more personalised patient care
